project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly in one-on-one and group chats.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Users can see delivery and read receipts for each message
Supports group chats with up to 50 participants
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-on-one and group video calls.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio quality remain stable with less than 300ms latency
Supports group video calls with up to 10 participants
dependencies: WebRTC or equivalent video streaming service
non_functional: Maintain video resolution of at least 720p under normal network conditions
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed that the application will be cross-platform (web and mobile) and will require secure authentication. Group size limits are assumptions and can be adjusted based on business needs.
